title: Overpowered TPOW for no reason

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every time you use your ability, the amount of players you may attack increments.
- Roleblock, Control, Conversion, and Redirect Immune.
- If a player attempts to Roleblock, Control, Convert, or Redirect you, you will deal an Unstoppable Rampaging attack to them, as well as dealing an Unstoppable Rampaging attack to the person the target visited the night before.
- You may not talk during the day cuz idk why not. However, you may still vote in your private channel.

desc:
Post 5471
*this is primarily because people just make the most broken roles known to man and make them tpows -nub*
